title: Called to Mordor (15U39)
text:
Set:	The Hunters
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Bearer must be Smeagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each time an opponent uses a skirmish special ability in a skirmish involving Gollum or Smeagol, you may wound a minion.
Rarity:	U
